questions.question: What is net force?
choices: The force of gravity on an object.
The sum of all forces acting on an object.
The strongest force acting on an object.
The force required to stop an object.
questions.correctAnswer: The sum of all forces acting on an object.

A book resting on a table is in equilibrium. The action force is the Earth pulling on the book (gravity). What is the reaction force according to Newton's Third Law?

The book pushing down on the table.

questions.correctAnswer: The book pulling up on the Earth.
